definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be bereaved (= Ar. 3akila Targum [[תְּכוֹל]], [[תְּכֵל]]; cf. Syr. tkolo0 loss of children);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[כַּאֲשֶׁר שָׁכׂלְתִּי שָׁכָָלְתִּי]] Ge 43:14 (E) if I am bereaved, I am bereaved (of father, expr. resignation; on [[כָָלְ]] v. Ges:§ 29 u); Impf. 1 s. [[אֶשְׁכַּל]] Ge 27:45 (E), c. acc. pers. be bereaved of you both (of mother); 3 fs. [[תִּשְׁכַּל מִנׇּשִׁים אִמֶָּךָ]] 1Sa 15:33 thy mother shall be bereaved above (more than) women.

make childless, acc. of father Ge 42:36 (E), of mothers 1Sa 15:33 (subj. [[חֶרֶב]]), cf. Ez Eze 5:17 (subj. famine and beasts), and Eze 14:15 (id.; obj. land); acc. of people Ho 9:12 ([[מֵאָדָם]]), Je 15:7 (+ [[אִבַּתְִּי]]), Ez Eze 36:12, cf. v:Eze 36:13, v:Eze 36:14 (v. supra); obj. om. (subj. [[חֶרֶב]]) De 22:25, La 1:20, Ez Eze 21:19 (Co, for [[תִּכָּפֵל]], v. [[כָּפַל]] p.495:b; otherwise Toy Krae).

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: cause barrenness, or abortion, ´[[הָאָרֶץ מְשַׁכְּ]]: 2Ki 2:19, cf. v:Eze 21:21 (Thes otherwise, v. ´[[מְשׁ]]: infra).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: shew barrenness, or abortion, (1) of any female Ex 23:26 (E; + [[עֲקָרָה]]), animals Ge 31:38 (E) Job 21:10; (2) of vine Mal 3:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[רֶהֶם]] ([[וְשָׁדַיִם חׂמְקִים]]) [[מַשְׁכִּיל]] Ho 9:14 miscarrying womb.—Je 50:9 read [[מַשְׂכִּיל]] successful, LXX SyrVer Heb Codd. Ew Hi Gf Gie.
